content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find this apartment to be a great fit for your needs. Let's indeed discuss the rental price. How much were you considering to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm open to offers, but I'm looking for a competitive price, considering the location and the amenities. Could you provide me with your best price for the apartment?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Certainly, Max. As a landlord, I'm always looking to provide the best value to my tenants. For this newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, I would offer a price of €1,200 per month. This includes all utilities except for electricity, which I would kindly ask you to cover. What do you think of this offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate the utilities being included, but I'm looking to keep my expenses as low as possible. Could we negotiate a lower price?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Absolutely, Max. I understand that everyone has a budget to consider. How much were you thinking of paying? Perhaps we can find a price that works for both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I was hoping to find something around €900 per month. This would fit within my budget and still allow me to enjoy the convenience of the location. Is there any room to negotiate on your end?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, your offer is significantly lower than my initial price. While I appreciate your budget constraints, I must maintain a certain profit margin. However, I'm willing to consider a slight reduction for a long-term tenant like yourself. I could potentially offer you the apartment for €1,150 per month, with a one-year lease agreement. This would be my final offer. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your final offer of €1,150 per month is more in line with what I had in mind. I'm willing to sign a one-year lease agreement to secure the apartment at this price. I agree to the price of €1,150 Euro!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Excellent, Max! I'm glad we could reach an agreement that suits both of us. The apartment will be yours at €1,150 per month, with all utilities except electricity included. Please let me know when you're ready to sign the lease agreement. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
